data.prayer: Lord, make the 926 believers in Matam to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 477,074 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Matam, Senegal
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Matam.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Matam.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Matam, Senegal by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Soninke people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 516 neighbors who are far from you in Matam. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Matam, Senegal need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the state of Matam, Senegal has a population of 478,000.

We estimate Matam has 926 people who might know Jesus, 21,901 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 455,173 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 516 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Matam, Senegal a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”
